[size=+1][b][/color][color=crimson]INSTALLL-UNISTALL[/size][/color][color=Lightgrey][/b]

Note: This is a replacer for the vanilla nightingale bow. The esp increases the base damage for 3 points (all my scoped bows are doing 3-5 points more base damage). If you don't need that delete the esp to use it as a pure replacer.

[u]Install[/u]
1.)Download and install the file. Use NMM ([i]Nexus Mod Manager[/i])
2.)Play and have Fun!

[u]Uninstall[/u]
1.)Uninstall the file
2.)Go to hell!


Folder Structure looks like this:

data/meshes/weapons/nightingale/...-here are the meshes
data/textures/weapons/sniper sight bows/nightingale/....-here are the textures




[b][/color][color=Deepskyblue]How To Get In Game[/color][color=Lightgrey][/b]

[u]Optaining[/u]
It is rewarded by Karliah, after completing the Thieves Guild quest Blindsighted.

[u]Cheating (Console Comand):[/u]
open the console with ^
1.)type: [b]help "nightingale bow"[/b] it will show up with it's id
2.)type: [b]player.additem xxxxxxxx 1[/b] (instead of x type the numbers of the id - the 1 at the end stands for the number of bows that you will get)



[/color][b][color=crimson]Recommendations[/b][/color][color=Lightgrey]

[u]MODS:[/u]

I highly recommend to use:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11941/?]ABT - Arrows and Bolts Tweaks[/url] (50% faster arrows)
+ Disable the HUD (much more fun) or at least disable crosshair and sneakeye using:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3222/?]Immersive Hud[/url]

Also useful:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26387/?]Simple Crosshair[/url] Choose "oblivion style sneak eye" to move the sneak eye down betwen health and magica bar. works great in combination with iHud.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33808/?]Better eagle eye and steady hand perks[/url] for a higher zoom-in with eagle eye perk.


[u]SKYRIM.INI TWEAKS[/u] Highly Recommended!(make a backup at first)

[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7

[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000
